text.div:
Viral Hemorrhagic Fever (Tests for Viral Hemorrhagic Fever Virus IgM Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    22379-2 Lassa virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum
    22380-0 Lassa virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum
    31453-4 Lassa virus IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    71706-6 Marburg virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71709-0 Lassa virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71711-6 Ebola virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71712-4 Ebola virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    71771-0 Marburg virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    7944-2 Lassa virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
    7945-9 Lassa virus IgM Ab [Titer] in Serum by Immunofluorescence
    88190-4 Crimean-Congo hemorrhagic fever virus IgM Ab [Presence] in Serum by Immunoassay
